title: Olympic Summer Games - revenue generated from domestic sponsorships 1996 to 2016
yAxis: Domestic sponsorship revenue in million U.S. dollars
summary: In general Domestic sponsorship revenue in million U.S. dollars has fallen over the Year.
Domestic sponsorship revenue in million U.S. dollars is roughly constant from 2008_Beijing to 2012_London, and finally slightly decreasing from 2012_London to 2016_Rio.
The most drastic decrease took place within the Year 2012_London and 2016_Rio.
Maximum Domestic sponsorship revenue in million U.S. dollars, about 1218.0 was reported at Year 2008_Beijing
The lowest Domestic sponsorship revenue in million U.S. dollars, of value 848.0 was reported at Year 2016_Rio
